title: Supply-chain paranoia: a practical Notepad++ sanity check
author: Jason Lamb
content_html:
Security is mostly being annoyingly consistent.

Basic checks that actually matter

  • Download from the official site (or a trusted package manager)
  • Verify the digital signature if present
  • Compare hashes when the vendor provides them
  • Keep it updated, but don’t auto-trust random mirrors

Bonus points: treat “portable EXEs from forum posts” as guilty until proven innocent.
